name: Tawa Standoff Torpedo Rack

customPrimary: Fires an inaccurate burst of three projectiles upon nearing its target.

name: Tawa Standoff Torpedo Battery
customPrimary: Fires an inaccurate burst of three projectiles upon nearing its target.

name: Plasma Lens Projector
customPrimary: Projectiles weakly home in on targets and collapse violently on impact with hull or armor, dealing %s x %s damage in a line as the plasma punches through internal compartments.

name: Toroidal Plasma Railgun
customPrimary: Collapsing plasma toroids deal an extra %s damage when hitting hull or armor.

name: Twin Toroidal Plasma Railgun
customPrimary: Collapsing plasma toroids deal an extra %s damage when hitting hull or armor.

name: Light Arc Emitter
customPrimary: Fires an arc at a random target within a %s cone.

name: Arc Emitter
customPrimary: Fires an arc at a random target within a %s cone. Arcs have a %s chance to chain to a secondary target.

name: Heavy Arc Emitter
customPrimary: Fires an arc at a random target within a %s cone. Arcs have a %s chance to produce up to %s secondary arcs. This chance increases with continuous firing, up to %s after %s.

name: Tawa Standoff Torpedo (Single)
customPrimary: Fires an inaccurate burst of three projectiles upon nearing its target.
